String.string: Slay Dakarius at the Valselok Shrine.
Find the Scion records at the Altar of Anguish at the Valselok Shrine.
Infiltrate the Bastion of Lok through the armory by using the teleportal. Speak with the Scions of Lok to gather intelligence.
Infiltrate the Bastion of Lok through the armory by using the teleportal. Speak with the Scions of Lok to gather intelligence.
Find Isla in the Bastion of Lok Armory.
